name: Clandestine (itch) (fnaimi66)
description:
Escape from the cult hideout. Avoid getting detected by cultists and make your getaway!

- Tag enemies with the 'E' button

-Win each level by making your way to the exit door

-Avoid being caught in the line of sight of the cultists

Browser vs Download

Visuals for tagging enemies behave strangely in the browser, but work perfectly in the download. Either way, the game is fully functional on both
